entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support debuging windows unpackaged app #23598
  • Collection was modified after the enumerator was instantiated. #23597
  • Media Picker CameraOptions #23596
  • maui workload 8.0.61/8.0.100 introduced NativeAOT runtime error in EFC .net 8 #23595
  • [WiP] Create a path where users can inherit from WrapperView (Also rename WrapperView to MauiPlatformView) #23594

Closed

  • FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync very slow #18199
    Backlog
  • Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22079
    Backlog
  • Crash: Window was already deactivated #22406
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Unable to Navigate Between Entries Using Tab Key #23559

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button

Merged

  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • Make ampersands work *more* in net9-only blazor-solution template #23589
    area-blazor, area-templates
  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
